Html:
Hi,
we have several PCÅ› installed with Win7 and Office 2010 now we have the challange to update to Office 2013.

Is that possible with WPP or do i need a other solution?

Thanks

regards
Carsten

Yes, it is possible to publish Office 2013 within WPP to your clients.

Which exact Edition/Version you want to publish? Is it from a Volume License Contract?
Hello, there is plenty Blog and HowTo describing this operation. I'm pretty much sure that Microsoft have publish an article on this.
Yes, there is a Video from Mark Heitbrink if he he is publishing a Office 2013 with WPP and WSUS to clients. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lPQlYw053CY Only in German Language. ;)
Cool ! I wasn't aware of this video.
